name: FitzyTV, Inc.
description: Operator of an open internet TV platform designed to watch and record internet TV channel that supports online streaming in a single user interface on Smart TV device. The company's web crawler scans the internet for the best channels, enabling users to unlock paid content with their subscription services and enjoy a selection of free internet television.
one_liner: Operator of an open internet TV platform designed to watch and record internet TV channel that supports online streaming in a single user interface on Smart TV device. The company's web crawler scans the internet for the best channels, enabling users to unlock paid content with their subscription services and enjoy a selection of free internet television.
